data.actual_result: Formatted part of line 3 in previous message appears at the beginning of the line that contains the codeblock in the edited message until you exit and reenter the channel.
data.expected_result: Message is edited as per normal
data.short_description: Editing a message may sometimes cause part of previous message to appear
data.steps_to_repro: - On any text channel, send a message with 4 lines separated by new lines such that lines 1 and 3 begin with formatted text and line 2 ends with a period - Edit message into anything with a small codeblock in it (single backticks)
